header.title: Dithulusi tsa Salatiso tsa OHS
sidebar.step_0.title: üìú O Amogetswe mo Dithulusing tsa Salatiso tsa OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Leba dithulusi tsa rona tse di tletseng le dithulusi go tokafatsa polokego ya bophelo mo sebakeng sa gago sa tiro.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ‚ö° A o tseba gore go dirisa baphakeli ba ba nang le maitsholo a matle go ka fokotsa dikotsi mo sebakeng sa tiro ka go netefatsa gore tiro e dirwa ka nako le ka maemo a godimo a polokego?
intro.title: O Amogetswe mo Dithulusing tsa Salatiso tsa OHS
intro.description: Leba dithulusi tsa rona tse di tletseng le dithulusi go tokafatsa polokego ya bophelo mo sebakeng sa gago sa tiro.
legal_obligations.client.title: Boikarabello ba Mokgatho
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Construction Regulation 5(1)(a): Itokisetse Tekolo ya Kotsi ya Motheo (BRA) e e supang dikotsi tsa projeke.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Construction Regulation 5(1)(b): Fana ka Dintlha tsa Bophelo le Polokego tse di tlhalosang ditlhoko tse di kgethegileng tsa projeke.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Construction Regulation 5(1)(l): Amogela Pholisi ya Bophelo le Polokego ya Mokgatho pele tiro e simolola.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Boikarabello ba Mokontiraka
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Construction Regulation 7(1)(a): Romela Pholisi ya Bophelo le Polokego e theilweng mo dintlheng tsa mokgatho.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Construction Regulation 7(1)(b): Boloka Faele ya Bophelo le Polokego mo saeteng e nang le ditokomane tse di tlhokegang tsohle.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Construction Regulation 9: Dira Ditlhotlhomisho tsa Kotsi le Ditlhotlhomisho tsa Kotsi (HIRA) tse di kgethegileng mo tirong.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Boikarabello ba Setsebi sa H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Construction Regulation 5(5): Baemedi (PrCHSA) ba laola H&S ka lebitso la mokgatho, ba netefatsa go latela molao.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Construction Regulation 8(5): Baofisiri (CHSO) ba thusa baphakeli ka go dirisa le go tlhotlhomisha ditsamaiso tsa H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Ditataiso tsa SACPCMP: E tshwanetse go boloka ngodiso le ditlhoko tsa CPD tsa maemo a setsebi.
action_buttons.hs_spec: Hlama Dintlha tsa Bophelo le Polokego
action_buttons.hs_plan: Hlama Pholisi ya Bophelo le Polokego
action_buttons.hs_file: Hlama Faele ya Bophelo le Polokego

training.title: Thuto e e Tletseng ya Sebaka sa Tiro
training.description: Leba diphulaganyo tsa rona tse di tletseng tsa thuto ya sebaka sa tiro go netefatsa go latela melao ya OHS ya Afrika Borwa le go kgothaletsa tikologo e e hlayisekile ya sebaka sa tiro. Kgetha thuto ya go dirisa ka matsogo, thuto ya sehlopha, kgotsa dirisa wizard ya rona go kwelela dikgakololo tse di kgethegileng tse theilweng mo indastering ya gago, bamameli ba lebeletswe, le sebaka.
training.action_buttons.view_manual: Reka Manual ya Thuto e e Ka Fetoswang
training.wizard.start: Ka kopo kgetha khetho go simolola tshebetso ya kgakololo ya thuto.

training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Tlhokomeliso ya SafetyHelp: Dithulusi tsa thuto tse di neetsweng ke tsa tlhaloso fela mme ga di emele dikgakololo tsa setsebi. Go kwelela ditharollo tsa OHS tse di kgethegileng, ikgolaganye le SafetyHelp mo support@safetyhelp.co.za kgotsa etela Leqephe la go Ikgolaganya.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.checkout.success: Go lefa go atlegile! Dithulusi tsa gago tsa thuto di hlamilwe. Download di-PDF tsa gago ka fa tlase. Bakeng sa thuto ya mo inthaneteng, di-khoutu tsa go tsena di rometswe go wena ka e-meile.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.checkout.online_codes: Di-Khoutu tsa go Tsena tsa Thuto ya mo Inthaneteng:
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.providers.title: Baphakeli ba Thuto ba ba Amogetsweng
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.providers.description: A o tlhoka thuto ya motho a le mongwe? Ikgolaganye le baphakeli ba thuto ba ba amogetsweng ka ditlhoko tsa gago.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - E Amogetswe ke SETA - E Kgethegile mo Thusong ya Pele, go Timamollo - Ikgolaganyo: info@abctraining.co.za
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - E Ngodisitswe mo SACPCMP - E Kgethegile mo Polokegong ya Kago - Ikgolaganyo: training@safeskills.co.za
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.providers.provider_3: SafetyHelp Training - Thuto e e Tletseng ya OHS - Ikgolaganyo: support@safetyhelp.co.za
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.manual.purchase.title: Reka Manual ya Thuto e e Ka Fetoswang
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.manual.purchase.description: Kwelela manual ya thuto e e tletseng e e hlamilweng khampani ya gago, e e nang le ditlhoko tsa molao, diteng tse di kgethegileng tsa khampani tse theilweng mo profayeleng ya gago ya kotsi, le ditheko go tswa go baphakeli ba thuto ba ba amogetsweng.

training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.manual.risk_profile.error: Ka kopo kgetha profayele ya kotsi.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.manual.risk_profile.option_high: Kotsi e e Phagame (mohl., Kago, Dikhemikhale)

training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.list.add_to_cart: Oketsa tse di Kgethilweng mo Bag
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.legal_fact.step_1: Nete ya Molao: Molao wa OHS Karolo 8 o tlhoka gore badiri ba fane ka thuto e e hlamilweng ka dikotsi tse di kgethegileng tsa sebaka sa tiro.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.fun_fact.step_2: Nete e e Thabisang: A o tseba gore thuto e e tshwanang e ka fokotsa ditiragalo tsa sebaka sa tiro go fihla 30%?
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.legal_fact.step_3: Nete ya Molao: Bomasepala ba selegae ba ka ba le melao ya OHS e e farologaneng e e amang ditlhoko tsa thuto.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.fun_fact.step_4: Nete e e Thabisang: Dibaka tsa tiro tse di nang le kotsi e e phagame jaaka disaete tsa kago di tlhoka thuto e e tshwanang go boloka maemo a polokego.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.training.legal_fact.step_5: Nete ya Molao: Molao wa OHS o laela thuto e kgethegileng ya maemo a jaaka baemedi ba SHE go netefatsa go latela molao.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.legislation.title: Molao wa OHS le Taolo ya Kotsi
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.legislation.description: Dira molao wa OHS le pholisi ya taolo ya kotsi e e hlamilweng khampani ya gago. Faka dintlha tsa khampani ya gago, ditiro, le dikotsi go kwelela pampiri e e tletseng ya go latela e e akaretsang molao wa Afrika Borwa, melao ya bomasepala, le maemo a dinateng.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.legislation.wizard.title: Dira RMP ya Gago

training.wizard.step_1.option_other.legislation.wizard.step_4.description: Hlahloba dintlha tse o di fantseng mme o dire RMP ya gago. O ka oketsa molao o mongwe fa o batla.

training.wizard.step_1.option_other.legislation.cart.title: Tefo
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.legislation.cart.description: RMP ya gago e hlamilwe! Dirisa khoutu ya vawut≈°ha FREERMP2025 go downloada mahala (batho ba pele ba 100).
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.suppliers.title: Lenane la Baphakeli ba OHS
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.suppliers.description: Fumana le go thwala baphakeli ba OHS mo Afrika Borwa. Batla ka sebaka, ditirelo, le disetifikeiti. Romela ditlhahlobo go thusa ba bangwe go dira diqeto tse di nang le tshedimosetso.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.suppliers.list.title: Lenane la Baphakeli
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.suppliers.table.name: Leina la Mophakeli
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.suppliers.review_form.title: Romela Ditlhahlobo
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.title: Dithulusi tsa Polokego ya Set≈°haba
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.description: Tlaleha tiragalo epe ya polokego kgotsa kotsi mo set≈°habeng sa gago kgotsa mo sebakeng sa gago sa tiro, go tswa mo dikoting go ya mo didirisiweng tse di sa direng sentle. Dirisa dithulusi tsa rona go netefatsa polokego mo dibakeng tse di jaaka distoro tsa spaza, dikolo, dipetlele, le dibara.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.incident_report.title: Tlaleha Tiragalo kgotsa Kotsi
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.incident_report.location: Sebaka se tla bonwa ka boitshwarelelo...
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.incident_report.weather_: Boemo jwa Maemo bo tla bonwa ka boitshwarelelo...
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.incident_report.descript: Tlhalosa tiragalo kgotsa kotsi (mohl., mokoti mo Main Street, setulo se se robegileng mo set≈°habeng)...
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.incident_report.user_con: Dintlha tsa go Ikgolaganya tsa Gago (Ka Boikgethelo):
Faka mogala kgotsa e-meile ya gago...
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.incident_report.user_soc: Handle ya Gago ya Social Media (Ka Boikgethelo, mohl., @username mo X):
Faka handle ya gago ya X...
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.incident_report.provider: Dintlha tsa go Ikgolaganya tsa Mophakeli wa Tirelo (Ka Boikgethelo):
Faka mogala kgotsa e-meile (e tla tlatsoa ka boitshwarelelo fa mophakeli a kgethilwe)...
Handle ya Social Media ya Mophakeli wa Tirelo (Ka Boikgethelo, mohl., @CityofJoburgZA mo X):
Faka handle ya X (e tla tlatsoa ka boitshwarelelo fa mophakeli a kgethilwe)...
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.list.title: Dithulusi tse Dingwe tsa Polokego ya Set≈°haba
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Lenane la Polokego ya Spaza Shop
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Netefatsa gore spaza shop ya gago e fihlelela ditlhoko tsa polokego ya mollo, motlakase, le sebopeho go ya ka melao ya bomasepala le molao wa OHS.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.list.school.title: Tataiso ya Polokego ya Mollo ya Sekolo
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.list.school.description: Ithute ditlhoko tsa molao tsa polokego ya mollo mo dikolong, go akaretsa diphulaganyo tsa go tswa le didirisiwa.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.list.hospital.title: Tataiso ya go Itokisetsa Maemo a Tshoganyetso a Sepetlele
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Netefatsa gore dipetlele di itokisetsa maemo a tshoganyetso ka diphulaganyo tse di nepagetseng tsa go tswa le didirisiwa tsa polokego.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.list.tavern.title: Lenane la Polokego ya Tavern
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.community_tools.list.tavern.description: Hlahloba gore dibara di latela melao ya polokego ya mollo le taolo ya bongata go thibela ditiragalo.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.dashboard.title: Dashboard ya Setho
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.dashboard.welcome: O Amogetswe, [Leina la Motirisi]! Laola go latela gago ka OHS, RMPs, ditlhahlobo tsa baphakeli, le dipampiri tsa set≈°haba fa.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.dashboard.profile.title: Profayele ya Khampani
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.dashboard.profile.supervisor_name_label: Leina la Mookamedi (Go Romela Pampiri ya Tiragalo):

training.wizard.step_1.option_other.dashboard.supplier_reviews.title: Ditlhahlobo tsa Baphakeli
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.dashboard.incident_reports.title: Dipampiri tsa Ditiragalo
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.document_categories.title: Hlama Ditokomane tsa Phulaganyo ya Gago ya Taolo ya OHS
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.document_categories.description: Kgetha le go hlama ditokomane tse o tla di tlhokang mo phulaganyong ya gago ya taolo ya OHS. Kgetha mo diphulaganyong, ditsamaisong, maemong, le tse dingwe, tse di hlamilweng ditlhoko tsa mokgatlho wa gago.
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.document_categories.policies.title: Diphulaganyo
training.wizard.step_1.option_other.document_categories.policies.description: Dipolelo tsa maemo a godimo tsa maikemisetso le boitlamo, tse di amogetsweng ke balaodi ba godimo.
